summary: Key findings on GPT-6 release status as of Feb 2026
content:
1. OpenAI's current model lineage as of Feb 2026: GPT-5 (Aug 2025), GPT-5.1 (Nov 2025), GPT-5.2 (Dec 11, 2025), GPT-5.3-Codex (Feb 5, 2026)
2. OpenAI explicitly confirmed in Oct 2025 that GPT-6 would NOT launch in 2025
3. No firm release date announced for GPT-6 - "sometime in 2026" is all we know officially
4. Sam Altman said gap between GPT-5 and GPT-6 will be shorter than GPT-4 to GPT-5
5. Speculation points to "first half of 2026" or "early 2026" but these are from third-party sources
6. One source (techannouncer) says "private previews in mid-2026 and a public release later in 2026 or early 2027"
7. OpenAI is still actively iterating on GPT-5.x series (5.1, 5.2, 5.3-Codex)
8. Manifold market "Will OpenAI release a model referred to as GPT-6 before June 1st, 2026?" at 16.6%
9. Manifold market "GPT-6 released in 2026?" at 76.3%
10. OpenAI acknowledged compute/inference bottlenecks serving users
